definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: One holiday afternoon his cousin Fred came to pay him a visit.
sentences.chinese: 一个假日的下午，他的堂哥福瑞德拜访他。

sentences.english: My cousin also has this special idea about this movie.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂哥对这部电影也有特别的想法。

sentences.english: Tonight I want to play computer brother.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我要和堂哥堂弟玩电脑。

sentences.english: It was also my cousin's birthday.
I sometimes enjoy fishing with my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 我有时很喜欢和堂哥去钓鱼。

sentences.english: Tony left his glasses in the room where his cousin lived.
sentences.chinese: 汤尼把他的眼镜留在他堂哥住的房间。

sentences.english: Her cousin can speak four kinds of languages.
sentences.chinese: 她的堂哥会说四种语言。

definition: younger male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
son of grandfather's sister/son of grandmother's brother or sister/father's younger male cousin/(Hong Kong slang) mainlander
younger female cousin via female line
husband of older female cousin via female line
older female cousin via female line
husband of younger female cousin via female line
